pluginstrument.author: SIMSTRUMENTATION
pluginstrument.description:
Ground Power Unit/External Power Knob See here for contact info and notes: https://github.com/simstrumentation
- This knob is compatiable with all aircraft that support GPU/External Power. - There is a user option to select aircraft for the purposing of backlighting according to dimmer knob. - There is a user option to hide background. - This knob is compatiable with SIMSTRUMENTATION Ambient Light Dimmer.
